alert.note: Alert for Eastern Columbia; Eastern Rensselaer; Northern Washington; Southern Washington; Western Columbia; Western Rensselaer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 20 at 7:10PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Locally Hazardous Travel Conditions Through This Evening... Occasional snow showers will remain possible across portions of the central and northern Taconics, southern Greens, and Berkshires through 10 PM. Additional snowfall accumulations of less than one inch will be possible during this time, especially for elevations above 1000 feet. As temperatures fall back into the upper 20s and lower 30s, some untreated ground surfaces will become slippery. Therefore, motorists and pedestrians should remain alert to the possibility of localized hazardous travel conditions through this evening.
